public class e3numbers {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int x = 10;
		int y = 15;
		int z = 4;
		if (x>y && x>z) {
			System.out.print("First No is Greater");
		}else { if(y>x && y>z) {
			System.out.print("Second No is Greater");
			}else {
				System.out.print("Third No. is Greater");
			}
		
		}
	}

}
